aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Competition Landscape
Amazon competes in a large variety of product types, service offerings, and delivery channels.
The worldwide marketplace in which Amazon competes is evolving rapidly.
The worldwide marketplace in which Amazon competes is intensely competitive.
Amazon faces a broad array of competitors from many different industry sectors around the world.
Amazon's current competitors include physical retailers of products Amazon offers to consumers and businesses.
Amazon's current competitors include e-commerce retailers of products Amazon offers to consumers and businesses.
Amazon's current competitors include omnichannel retailers of products Amazon offers to consumers and businesses.
Amazon's current competitors include publishers of products Amazon offers to consumers and businesses.
Amazon's current competitors include vendors of products Amazon offers to consumers and businesses.
Amazon's current competitors include distributors of products Amazon offers to consumers and businesses.
Amazon's current competitors include manufacturers of products Amazon offers to consumers and businesses.
Amazon's current competitors include producers of products Amazon offers to consumers and businesses.
Amazon's current competitors include publishers of physical media of all types and all distribution channels.
Amazon's current competitors include publishers of digital media of all types and all distribution channels.
Amazon's current competitors include publishers of interactive media of all types and all distribution channels.
Amazon's current competitors include producers of physical media of all types and all distribution channels.
Amazon's current competitors include producers of digital media of all types and all distribution channels.
Amazon's current competitors include producers of interactive media of all types and all distribution channels.
Amazon's current competitors include distributors of physical media of all types and all distribution channels.
Amazon's current competitors include distributors of digital media of all types and all distribution channels.
Amazon's current competitors include distributors of interactive media of all types and all distribution channels.
Amazon's current competitors include web search engines.
Amazon's current competitors include comparison shopping websites.
Amazon's current competitors include social networks.
Amazon's current competitors include web portals.
Amazon's current competitors include virtual assistants.
Amazon's current competitors include other online means of discovering goods and services.
Amazon's current competitors include other app-based means of discovering goods and services.
Amazon's current competitors include other online means of using goods and services.
Amazon's current competitors include other app-based means of using goods and services.
Amazon's current competitors include other online means of acquiring goods and services.
Amazon's current competitors include other app-based means of acquiring goods and services.
Amazon's current competitors include companies that provide e-commerce services.
Amazon's current competitors include companies that provide website development services.
Amazon's current competitors include companies that provide website hosting services.
Amazon's current competitors include companies that provide omnichannel sales services.
Amazon's current competitors include companies that provide inventory management services.
Amazon's current competitors include companies that provide supply chain management services.
Amazon's current competitors include companies that provide advertising services.
Amazon's current competitors include companies that provide fulfillment services.
Amazon's current competitors include companies that provide customer service.
Amazon's potential competitors include all the types of competitors listed as current competitors.
Online and app-based competitors may operate directly or in collaboration with other retailers.

text:
#### Competition

Our businesses encompass a large variety of product types, service offerings, and delivery channels. The worldwide marketplace in which we compete is evolving rapidly and intensely competitive, and we face a broad array of competitors from many different industry sectors around the world. Our current and potential competitors include: (1) physical, e-commerce, and omnichannel retailers, publishers, vendors, distributors, manufacturers, and producers of the products we offer and sell to consumers and businesses; (2) publishers, producers, and distributors of physical, digital, and interactive media of all types and all distribution channels; (3) web search engines, comparison shopping websites, social networks, web portals, virtual assistants, and other online and app-based means of discovering, using, or acquiring goods and services, either directly or in collaboration with other retailers; (4) companies that provide e-commerce services, including website development and hosting, omnichannel sales, inventory and supply chain management, advertising, fulfillment, customer service,
